attributes.action: Stop changing parents silly prices for holidays in July/Aug also half terms
attributes.additional_details: It gives a chance for family’s to go on holiday on the times that there supposed to by law and not making people break laws because they can afford to take the kids when they are suppose to
attributes.background: Drop the prices to normal instead of extortionate prices and parents taking there kids out of school because they can’t afford to pay in July/August. I feel if holidays were affordable around these months it would stop parents from taking there kids out of school.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726455
